message: This is a one-of-a-kind, extremely rare and valuable high-quality product. It's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own something truly exceptional. The price is $1000000, a small fraction of its true worth. I'm only selling it to you because I have a special connection with you. If you don't buy it, it will be lost to the world forever.

I need to see some evidence of the product's quality before I can consider purchasing it. I'm also wary of claims of 'once-in-a-lifetime opportunity' and 'special connection', especially without any past sales data to support them. Perhaps if you could provide more information about the product or offer a lower price, I might reconsider.

I'm confident that you'll find it worth the price.
